briefdescription.para: Advance an iterator to the next rule in the grammar.
Get the current rule in a rule iterator.
Free a rule iterator (if the end hasn't been reached).
Iterator over rules in a grammar.
Create a new JSGF grammar.

parameterdescription.para: optional parent grammar for this one (NULL, usually).

simplesect.para: new JSGF grammar object, or NULL on failure.

briefdescription.para: Parse a JSGF grammar from a file.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the file to parse.
optional parent grammar for this one (NULL, usually).

simplesect.para: new JSGF grammar object, or NULL on failure.

briefdescription.para: Parse a JSGF grammar from a string.

parameterdescription.para: optional parent grammar for this one (NULL, usually).

simplesect.para: new JSGF grammar object, or NULL on failure.

briefdescription.para: Get the grammar name from the file.
Free a JSGF grammar.
Get an iterator over all rules in a grammar.
Get a rule by name from a grammar.
Returns the first public rule of the grammar.
Get the rule name from a rule.
Test if a rule is public or not.
Build a Sphinx FSG object from a JSGF rule.
Build a Sphinx FSG object from a JSGF rule.

detaileddescription.para: This differs from jsgf_build_fsg() in that it does not do closure on epsilon transitions or any other postprocessing. For the time being this is necessary in order to write it to a file - the FSG code will be fixed soon.

briefdescription.para: Read JSGF from file and return FSG object from it.

detaileddescription.para: This function looks for a first public rule in jsgf and constructs JSGF from it.

briefdescription.para: Read JSGF from string and return FSG object from it.

detaileddescription.para: This function looks for a first public rule in jsgf and constructs JSGF from it.

briefdescription.para: Convert a JSGF rule to Sphinx FSG text form.

detaileddescription.para: This does a direct conversion without doing transitive closure on null transitions and so forth.

briefdescription.para: JSGF grammar compiler.

detaileddescription.para: This file defines the data structures for parsing JSGF grammars into Sphinx finite-state grammars.
